meanings.definition: To make Latin in form or character.
meanings.sent1: She latinizes her writing by using Latin phrases.
meanings.sent2: The teacher latinizes the text to help students understand Latin better.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to latinize his speech with Latin words made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The old building latinizes the street with its classical architecture.
meanings.sent5: The artist latinizes the painting with Roman symbols, making it stand out.

meanings.sent1: The ceremony latinizes traditional rituals with a Latin touch.
